These months, from June to September, see little to no rainfall, making the air dry and the skies perpetually clear. Conversely, the winter months, spanning from November to February, are mild and more comfortable, with temperatures ranging from 10°C to 20°C (50°F to 68°F). During this period, Tiberias experiences most of its annual rainfall, which typically amounts to around 400-500 mm (15.7-19.7 inches). The rain showers, though relatively rare, can be heavy, transforming the parched landscape into a lush green haven.
